details.title: Gibson.app - Full Stack Development
details.description: Pivotal role in comprehensive development, contributing to both frontend and backend for a seamless user experience.

details.title: Frontend Technologies
details.description: Utilized cutting-edge technologies, including Next.js for robust frontend interfaces, Tailwind CSS for styling, and Firebase for frontend-backend interactions.

details.title: Backend Development with Laravel
details.description: Served as a Laravel Developer, crafting REST APIs seamlessly integrated with the Next.js app. Achievements include implementing Stripe promo code integration, validation, and providing custom checkout experiences using the React.js Stripe package.

details.title: Key Achievements
details.description: Instrumental in evolving Gibson.app, collaborating with cross-functional teams to implement new features, resolve bugs, and enhance overall performance over the past 7 months.

details.title: Web and Mobile App Development
details.description: Led full-stack development for diverse projects, including portfolio websites, travel accommodation apps, e-commerce applications, and streamlined booking websites.

details.title: Technological Expertise
details.description: Proficient in React.js, React Native, Next.js, and Laravel for building robust REST APIs, managing databases, and integrating third-party APIs. Crafted visually stunning UI using Bootstrap and implemented dynamic front-end interactions with jQuery.

details.title: Testing and Deployment
details.description: Ensured code reliability and efficiency through rigorous testing methodologies, implementing seamless deployment practices for efficient project delivery.
